messages.message: Is anyone here aware of the service `ocr-msft-translate` being valuably used internally or in a customer environment? I'm hoping to better understand its eligibility for deprecation. As far as I know, the service may have been used in a PoV for GS at some point, but it is unclear if its usage has persisted. cc @Rakesh @shaunak @peter @Jason
JPMC is asking to use it for a new use case, to translate from Dutch to En. Actively chasing
Do we use it for the translation app?
They have not specified this to me yet. They did point me to our document that mentioned about us natively supporting translation and other operation via pre-trained models

I was discussing this with the team here https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0119EXLXGU/p1702993176142179?thread_ts=1702993176.142179&cid=C0119EXLXGU (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0119EXLXGU/p1702993176142179?thread_ts=1702993176.142179&cid=C0119EXLXGU)
This was not GA so I have not noticed it being used for anything yet. On a poc basis a couple of times that's it.
